channel.title: Pvp xchange Need coins
channel.description:
Hello.. On my server i have pk point exchange for e.g when you kill somone you get points and can xchange for items from the pvp shop Although, you need coins .. For e.g if the item in the pvp shop was 300 pk points
u`ll need 300 coins Too!
Or you wont be able to buy
Can somone please tell me how to fix it so that you can buy items without coins and ONLY with pk points
Help is appreciated
Thanks

item.title: Pvp xchange Need coins
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Well i have shops… and i just want to fix it so that it doesnt need coins to buy items… aswell as pk points

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp xchange Need coins
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You can create a command instead. Something like -

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && pkPoints >= 100) { int[] items = {Runes' ID's}; int[] amounts = new int[items.length]; java.util.Arrays.fill(amounts, AMOUNT); bankItems = items; bankItemsN = amounts; pkPoints -= 100; }

Or…just -

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && pkPoints >= 100) { addItem(####, #); pkPoints -= 100; }

It does work on Delta. I tried it.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp xchange Need coins
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

I tried that jc and it dont work please note im usin delta source

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp xchange Need coins
item.dc:creator: @Kids Kids_
item.description:
@Kids wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:267848”]You can create a command instead. Something like -

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && pkPoints >= 100) { int[] items = {Runes' ID's}; int[] amounts = new int[items.length]; java.util.Arrays.fill(amounts, AMOUNT); bankItems = items; bankItemsN = amounts; }

Or…just -

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && pkPoints >= 100) { addItem(####, #); }[/quote]

But doing this would not remove the players current PK points or would it?

Read full topic
